originalText.text: Dr. Szot is a keen healer. Part intuition (larger parts empirical knowledge) empathetic great sense of humor (she laughs at my jokes).  A very steady calming presence.

text.text: Dr. Szot is a keen healer. Part intuition (larger parts empirical knowledge) empathetic great sense of humor (she laughs at my jokes).  A very steady calming presence.

originalText.text: I found Dr Szot to be very thorough as well as pleasant and caring. I just saw her as a new patient for a wellness visit and I’ve recommended her to my wife.

text.text: I found Dr Szot to be very thorough as well as pleasant and caring. I just saw her as a new patient for a wellness visit and I’ve recommended her to my wife.

originalText.text: I just had my first annual check up with Dr. Szot and my experience with her and Weill Cornell in general was night and day compared to other medical practices.  I was seen on time, and Dr. Szot spent a lot of time going over my health history and concerns. She was knowledgeable and filled with positive energy. Unlike my prior doctor who made me go to a ENT specialist to clean my ears (which took up time and $) Dr. Szot cheerfully did it herself.  She was also great with follow up and making all the necessary prescriptions.  I am very glad I made the switch.

originalText.text: Excellent doctor. Caring. Compassionate. Unhurried. Personable. This was my wife’s and my first visit. We will definitely be back.

text.text: Excellent doctor. Caring. Compassionate. Unhurried. Personable. This was my wife’s and my first visit. We will definitely be back.

originalText.text: Dr. Szot is an outstanding physician! I’m grateful for her knowledge, full attention - listening & communicating and her compassionate demeanor during our first meeting. I love the plans, Dr. Szot, proposed for several medical areas of concern.  Just so smart & KIND!  Specialist referrals made immediately and Rx being filled by pharmacy before I left the office. Thorough medical care with a kind heart.  I fully endorse Dr. Szot!!!   Our meeting has put me at ease in my lengthy search for a knowledgeable MD in the Weill Cornell/NYP healthcare system.
